effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.

short_effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
